item.title: Package List
item.description: Data Analysis Library python [2022-04-29 Fri 19:28] -> aim Python Data Analysis Library — pandas: Python Data Analysis Library urllib — URL handling modules — Python 3.7.4 documentation IPy · PyPI drkjam/netaddr: A network address manipulation library for Python john-kurkowski/tldextract: Accurately separate the TLD from the registered domain and subdomains of a URL, using the Public Suffix List. networkx/networkx: Official NetworkX source code repository. format parse python SuperCowPowers/bat: Bro Analysis Tools (BAT): Processing and analysis of Bro network data with Pandas, scikit-learn, and Spark Zeek Visualizations R Create Elegant Data Visualisations Using the Grammar of Graphics • ggplot2 yutannihilation/gghighlight: Highlight points and lines in ggplot2 business-science/anomalize: Tidy anomaly detection teunbrand/ggnomics: A small project to add ggplot2 extensions r-spatial/sf: Simple Features for R - Brave time R xts function | R Documentation business-science/timetk: A toolkit for working with time series in R Distance/ Geoip python [[https://github.

item.title: Phishing
item.description: SMTP/email Deepsea quickly test commmands - Tow methods: templated and hand-rolled cd ./test/deepsea nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml content inline nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml content multipart - create DB and load from CSV ./result/bin/deepsea -t nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml storage -D test/deepsea/template.db manager -T createtable - load CSV nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml storage -d ./template.db load -s .
